channel.title: Cant get npc to Drop items?
channel.description:
OK... having trouble with my npcdrops
im a newer coder....so yeah...
ok heres what i do [code]npcdrop = 1850 5 15333 1 390 20 390 50 390 10 995 1000 995 80000 995 1000000 npcdrop = 1855 5 15156 1 15346 1 15347 1 15345 1 npcdrop = 1856 1 4109 1 4109 1 4111 1 4113 1 4115 1 4117 1 [/code]
them are avatars of range str mage..
ok....
i did, npcdrop = (npcid) <---i think?
and then i did the drop type 0-5... and i never get a drop?
im getting so agravated... and i need help =(
